description:
After an accident, Kuroyanagi lost all sense of taste. Will he have to retire from being a judge forever? Meanwhile, Kazuma has to think of a way to defeat his old friend, Liu, in a match to make Chinese-style steamed buns!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kuroyanagi in Trouble!! The Lost Reactions!
คุโรยานางิอันตราย!! รีแอคชั่นที่สูญเสียไป!
あやうし黒柳!! 失われたリアクション!
